name: Traileys Sufficient School 100 building
description:
My simple first little horror game made on Scratch,  Trailey’s sufficient School, the nice old city’s infamous Elementary and High School! Though things are different when you’re in the wrong place during the wrong time

(Warning Contains Jumpscares and Flickering lights)

Controls

Look to different Directions -  Click the side buttons L - Left R - Right

To Close side door - Click Door Knob

Turn off Light - Space key or button

Run - Tap the run button

Made first around Oct 29
